summary: The story of how Eun-jin (Eun-kyung Shin) became a legend in the South Korean underworld by defeating an army of gangsters.
cast: Eun-Kyung Shin|Jae-mo Ahn|In-kwon Kim|Se-jin Jang|Won-cheol Shim|Jeong-hun Yeon|Eun-ju Choi|Gye-nam Myeong|Ji-su Lee|Gu-taek Kim|Joo-hwan Jeong|Seong-pil Kang|Wang-sun Choi|Tae-Gwang Hwang|In-mun Kim|Jung-Hee Nam|Sin-ae Shin|Ju-yeon Ko|Hanssen Jeon|Cheol-jin Shin|Jang-soo Bae|Min-su Choi|So-yeong Jeong|Hyo-jin Kang|Yong-woon Kwon|Eung-Kyung Lee|Mi-suk Lee|Park Sang-Myeon|Ahn Suk-hwan
title: Mi mujer es una gángster
